301.name: Tuxedo Sam
301.description: Played cards with Diamond suit give +100 points when scored

302.name: Hello Kitty
302.description: Played cards with Heart suit give +2 multi and +50 cash when scored

303.name: Kuromi
303.description: Played cards with Spade suit give +4 multi and +10 points when scored

304.name: Pompompurin
304.description: Played cards with Club suit give +100 cash when scored

305.name: Little Twin Stars
305.description: +8 multi if played hand contains a Pair

306.name: The Devil
306.description: +300 points if played hand contains a Three of a Kind

307.name: The Hieropant
307.description: +10 multi and +50 points if played hand contains a Two Pair

308.name: The Tower
308.description: +12 multi if played hand contains a Straight

309.name: The Lovers
309.description: +12 multi and +200 cash if played hand contains a Flush

310.name: The Moon
310.description: +50 cash if played hand contains a Pair

311.name: Kerokerokeroppi
311.description: +100 cash if played hand contains a Three of a Kind

312.name: Hangyodon
312.description: +80 cash if played hand contains a Two Pair

313.name: The Sun
313.description: +300 cash if played hand contains a Straight

314.name: The Empress
314.description: +500 cash if played hand contains a Flush

315.name: The High Priestess
315.description: +1000 cash if played hand contains a Royal Flush

318.name: The world
